title: Plat IV ADC, Top or Support LFT
body:
Played on stage before with other games so i know how to handle the competitive environment want a team that play regularly so that practise may happen. I'm comfortable with shot calling, I'm more than capable with any of those 3 roles, also a flexible player so i can play whatever your team desires. Can play at any time really.

IGN: canofkungfu

replies.body: Hey there, I'm a support main myself, looking for a solid adc main for solo queue. I've added you in game. :)
